name: atama
description: A smart state manager with history and persistence
author: Francisco Presencia <public@francisco.io> (https://francisco.io/)

scripts.build: rollup src/atama.js -o dist/atama.js --name stama --output.format umd && uglifyjs atama.js -o atama.min.js --source-map-inline
scripts.gzip: gzip -c state.min.js | wc -c && echo 'bytes' # Only for Unix
